articles.title: Stuart Law appointed head coach of USA men's team - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The former Australia batter has previously been the head coach for Bangladesh and West Indies
articles.content: Stuart Law's first assignment with USA will be a T20I series at home against Bangladesh  •  Getty Images
